definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: murder, slay (NH (rare, also in deriv.) = BH; cf. Ar. rad.ah.a, rad,axa break, bruise, crush);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. ´[[וְר]]: Nu 35:27, [[וּרְחָחוֹ]] De 22:26; 2 ms. [[רָחַחְתָּ]]([[הֲ]]) 1Ki 21:19; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְחַח]] Nu 35:30, De 4:42; 2 ms. ([[חַח]]-)[[תִּרְחָָח ]] Ex 20:13 = De 5:17; Inf. abs. [[רָחׂהַּ]] Ho 4:2, Je 7:9; Pt. act. [[רׂחֵחַ]] De 19:3 +, [[רוֹי]] De 4:42 +;—murder, slay, with premeditation, Ex 20:13 (E) = De 5:17, Ho 4:2, Je 7:9, 1Ki 21:19 (all abs.); c. acc. pers. De 22:26, unawares De 4:42; slay as avenger Nu 35:27; Nu 35:30 (P; ‖[[חֵמִית ]] v:Nu 35:19; v:Nu 35:21); esp. pt. as subst. = slayer, manslayer, without intent, De 4:42, De 19:3, De 19:4, De 19:6; also in P: Nu 35:6, Nu 35:11, Nu 35:12, Nu 35:25, Nu 35:26, Nu 35:27, Nu 35:28, Jos 20:3, Jos 20:5, Jos 20:6, Jos 21:13, Jos 21:21, Jos 21:27, Jos 21:32, Jos 21:26 (van d. H., Baer, v:Jos 21:38 Gi; all P); murderer, with intent, Nu 35:16, Nu 35:16, Nu 35:17, Nu 35:17, Nu 35:18, Nu 35:18, Nu 35:19, Nu 35:21, Nu 35:21, Nu 35:30, Nu 35:31; also Job 24:14.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[אֵרָחֵחַ]] Pr 22:13 I shall be slain; Pt. fs. as adj. [[אִשָּׁה הַנִּרְחָחָה]] Ju Jdg 20:4 the murdered woman.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: (intens.) murder, assassinate: 3 mpl. [[יְרַיְרַצְּחוּ]] Ho 6:9 (abs.), [[יְרַצֵָּחוּ]] Ps 94:6 (acc. pers., ‖[[הָרַג ]]); Ps 62:4 v. infr.; Pt. [[מְרַצֵּחַ]], as subst. 2Ki 6:32 murderer, assassin; pl. [[מְרֵצְּחִים]] Is 1:21assassins.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf., 2 mpl. [[תְּרָצְּחוּ]] Ps 62:4, so Baer Gi, van d. H. [[תְּרָחְחוּ]], but Ben Napht.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: [[תְּרַצְּחוּ]] (Baer:143), so Vrss Hup-Now De Che Bae al. ye murder (or batter, shatter).
